title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing earrings in a dream

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of earrings in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about earrings in a dreamIt is full of many associations and depending on the condition, shape and material of the earrings, the full meaning of the vision will be clarified and in the following article you will find different paragraphs about the interpretation of a dream about earrings or earrings and for unmarried, married, pregnant and divorced women Read below to find out the detailed interpretation of your sleep.You have a dream that confuses you..wait what? Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Earrings in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about earrings according to Al-Nabulsi indicates the dreamer’s profession in which he will work and live, and it will be in one of the artistic fields, specifically in music, with everything that includes playing, singing, and organizing music. And other various departments. Seeing earrings in a dream can come from the subconscious, which means that the dreamer wants to buy certain earrings and she sees in her dream that she is buying them, and therefore the dream here is self-talk and a wish that the dreamer wants. Investigation. Ibn Shaheen explained the meanings of seeing many earrings, and said that when a woman or man dreams of earrings in their ears, they love singing, singing, and music, and they have a musical ear. When the dreamer wears earrings made of natural pearls, he is pious, cares about the Qur’an, and listens carefully to memorize it completely. If it is Earrings are silver, as this is a positive sign and an indication of the believer’s piety and sincere faith in God Almighty. When a woman wears gold earrings in her dream, she will be successful and distinguished in life, provided that her neck is not large and causes pain in her ear. Golden earrings in a dream are evidence that the dreamer listens to advice Value and walks on it in life to avoid any bad situations or losses. If a girl sees in a dream beautiful and expensive earrings, then this scene has a positive connotation and is interpreted by achieving her big goals and achieving the highest levels of well-being in work and money. Earrings in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said If the dreamer sees an earring or earrings in a dream, then he is one of the creative people, and this blessing that God has bestowed on him will use in his work until he achieves great degrees of success. Earrings, if broken in a dream, are a bad sign, indicating unpleasant news, failure in work and relationships. Romance, and also that the dreamer will abandon his loved ones and cause a painful separation between them. When the dreamer sees that he is wearing cut earrings in a dream, this indicates his lack of respect for the sermons given to him by those who are older than him in experience and age. Also, cut or missing earrings in the vision are a sign of... The dreamer's imbalance in his work and the emergence of problems in it, and he will soon live in financial hardship. A gift of earrings means good news or pregnancy and may symbolize a new event that satisfies the dreamer in his life, such as a new job or a material reward. Stealing earrings in a dream is a bad symbol, As well as replacing them with cheaper and less beautiful ones, which indicates loss and the dreamer’s presence in a lower professional and financial position than the one he was in. The most important interpretations of seeing earrings

The most important interpretations of seeing earrings

title: A red blouse in a dream for a single woman, for great interpreters

preview.html: The red blouse in a dream for a single woman is one of the most common dreams that scholars differ in interpreting due to its multiple connotations. There is also a contradiction in the interpretation of this dream according to the social status of the dreamer. Therefore, he evaluated the site. In this article, the interpretation of a dream about a red blouse in a dream for a single woman. Married, pregnant, and divorced women. A red blouse in a dream for a single woman. Senior commentators believe that the color red in a woman’s dream in general is a common color, as it indicates the grace and goodness that the vision will have in her professional and social life. Whether this color is in the clothes or in any of the tools used. By women. Use, such as a bag. Dreaming of a red blouse in a single woman’s dream indicates that God will bring this girl together with a special young man who will propose to her, and this young man will be very suitable for her, although at first she will not be encouraged much to complete the marriage, but her heart is inclined After him and she will be deeply attached to him. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone is giving her a gift and that gift is a red blouse, this means that the person giving her the gift will do her a favor that will help her change her life for the better. Some dream interpreters have interpreted a single woman’s dream of obtaining a red blouse as evidence of the great success and excellence that the dreamer will achieve in her field of study and then in her professional life. At the level of psychology, some scholars have tended to consider the dream of a red blouse in an unmarried girl’s dream as one of the dreams that It indicates the kindling of feelings and feelings of passion towards someone, while some interpreters said that wearing a red shirt. A blouse in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the elegance and charm that the dreamer possesses and the influence of everyone around her. Her beauty. When an unmarried girl in a dream wears a red blouse and this blouse is torn. This is an unfortunate vision, as it indicates that the dreamer’s joy will not be complete and that her feeling of happiness will turn into a strong feeling of unhappiness. And depression. If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a red blouse in a dream, and then another girl from her peers comes and steals this red blouse from her and wears it, then this dream indicates that the dreamer is busy with something and wishes for himself. With her, but this matter will not be achieved at this time and you will be late in achieving it. Interpretation of a dream about wearing red pajamas for a single woman. After thinking about the interpretation of a dream about a red blouse in a dream for a single woman, it should be noted that the dream of wearing red pajamas in a woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of her desires that she has always dreamed of. The dream of wearing red pajamas in a girl’s dream expresses that this girl will wear a jacket, but if the girl sees that she is wearing red pajamas, but they are burning in the dream, this is evidence of many problems that the dreamer will face. Red veil in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a red veil in her dream, this is a sign that she will enjoy optimism and live a bright life.

title: Interpretation of seeing the result in a dream and success

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the result in a dream. Interpretation of dreams is one of the widespread phenomena since ancient times. Interpretation of seeing the result in a dream. It is an important interpretation that depends on the viewer and his social or age status. The interpretation of this vision of the result also depends on whether the result is a success or a failure because each of them has a different interpretation from the other, which we will explain in This article.Interpretation of the appearance of the result in a dream for a single girl. Seeing an unmarried girl and the result in a dream and her success means that this girl will be blessed by God to satisfy her desire, and also means payment in matters. Seeing an unmarried girl succeeding in her dream means that her life is full of happiness and joy, and that God The Almighty will grant her in the near future a good husband who is successful in his life and close to God. Seeing a university degree for an unmarried girl means getting closer to marriage or reaching advanced stages of excellence such as obtaining a master’s and doctorate. Seeing success for a single girl also shows his ability to overcome life’s problems Seeing success in an unmarried girl’s dream also means obtaining a prestigious job after completing her studies. Interpretation of seeing success for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing the result in a dream is different. Interpretation of seeing the result in a dream for a married woman. For an unmarried woman, the interpretation of a married woman’s dream means: Seeing the result of a married woman in A dream and her success indicates the success she has achieved in her life in general and in her married life in particular. Seeing a married woman succeeding means the success of that woman’s children or the success of her husband, wow. Seeing a married woman succeeding in a dream and not having children means that pregnancy will occur soon and children will be born. God willing. The success of a married woman in a dream indicates that she will gain the approval of her husband and his intense love for her, as well as the love of her children for her. If a dream of success is repeated for a married woman, this indicates her success in achieving the big dream that she seeks. Success in a married woman’s dream means obtaining A good and abundant meal. The interpretation of success in a dream for a divorced woman comes. The interpretation of seeing the result in a dream for divorced women based on her marital status and divorce is somewhat different from the interpretation of the same vision for an unmarried or married girl, i.e.: A divorced woman’s vision of success indicates that God will soon bless her with an abundance of goodness, livelihood, and blessings in her life. When a divorced woman sees success in a dream, this indicates her ability to achieve the goals and ambitions that she seeks in her life. Read also: 7 interpretations of infidelity in a dream for an unmarried woman and a young man by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of the appearance of the result in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing the result in a dream. Vision The result of a pregnant woman in a dream and success indicates that she has a lot of joy and happiness in her life. Seeing a pregnant woman successfully indicates the nearness of relief and relief from pregnancy problems and comfort. The success of a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that her pregnancy will go well without trouble or effort. Seeing a pregnant woman succeeding in a dream indicates...

title: Searching for gold in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Searching for gold in a dream for a married woman: The dream of finding gold in a dream is one of the dreams promising goodness and comfort, so it is one of the dreams worthy of praise and reassuring. The dream of finding gold in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will receive happy news in the coming period, as she may have a lot of Money or she may have a pregnancy. Some interpreters see that finding gold in a dream is a sign that a married woman will give birth to a girl, God willing. A married woman’s dream of finding gold portends success in this world, as she may get a promotion at work or succeed in studies. The presence of gold in a dream is a sign of success and excellence in this world, and seeing it is a sign of bringing goodness. The presence of gold in a married woman’s dream shows her values ​​and morals and she lives a stable and happy life with her husband. Seeing gold in a married woman’s dream and feeling happy are promising signs of increasing livelihoods in the world. This world.Interpretation of a dream about finding a jar of gold. Interpreters believe that seeing gold in a dream has many meanings, and losing gold and finding it again is a sign that you will hear happy news in the coming period. A dream about finding a jar of gold means that the dreamer is suffering from severe distress. And dreaming about it is a message of relief and abundance of livelihood. Dreaming about finding a jar of gold means that the dreamer will be blessed with a lot of money and will be able to achieve his goals. Seeing a man finding a jar of gold in a dream means that he will enter into a new business and will be able to achieve different profits. Seeing finding a large golden vase in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will receive a gift from her husband, and the vision indicates that she will create a happy married life. Dreaming of finding a jar of gold in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will marry a good man and the marriage will be crowned with good offspring. Interprets Dreaming of losing gold in a dream indicates that the dreamer will stumble upon some issues, but he will be able to solve them, God willing. Seeing a jar of gold in the sea is considered one of the most promising dreams, because it represents fame through work and success in the world. Seeing a golden jar in a pregnant woman’s dream means That she will give birth to sons and daughters, and her life will be filled with goodness and blessings. Dreaming about a golden bowl indicates that the dreamer is hesitant to engage in any work and seeing it as a sign of success, so he must rely on God so that he will reap abundant profits. Interpretation of a dream about finding a lost gold ring. The mind stores many events The daily life that resides in the memory and the subconscious mind interacts with it. The dreamer may see some false dreams that are meaningless and therefore they are accumulated dreams. As for the correct visions, they are the correct visions that promise the dreamer goodness and comfort in this world. Seeing finding lost gold in a dream is interpreted as an indication that the dreamer will enjoy abundance in life, God willing. Seeing finding a lost gold ring in a dream means that the dreamer will receive Good news about work in the coming period. See

title: Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Baqarah and reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream

preview.html: Seeing Surah Al-Baqarah for the unmarried, for the married woman, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced woman, or listening to the writing of the recitation of Ayat Al-Kursi, and more about Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream. Surah Al-Baqarah in a dream interprets that the dreamer will live safely in this world + may God protect him from fear on the Day of Resurrection. Reading the chapters The last of Surah Al-Baqarah in a dream symbolizes God’s protection from the evil of humans and jinn, God willing, for the reader. Whoever sees Surah Al-Baqarah in a dream or something like that, or if it is recited to him, he will be blessed with knowledge, long life, righteousness in his religion, and success in his child. Aisha said May God be pleased with her: Whoever recites Surah Al-Baqarah in his sleep, or something from it, will move from one place to another, and his wealth will be in the place to which he moved. Ibn Faddala, may God have mercy on him, said: If he is a judge, his time is near. Even though the world has been long and his condition is good. Some scholars have said: Whoever reads Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream is a collector of religion, hastening for every reward. He will remain for a long time, little in evil and patient in evil. Interpretation of Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin says that if a person is seen reciting Surat Al-Baqarah or reading it out loud Or humbly or in prayer, this is evidence of longevity that he will live, God willing, or that he is good in his morals, religion, and good treatment. The longer it takes to read it in a dream, the better the interpretation will be for the fortuneteller. It is said by many interpretation scholars that seeing a judge or a judge among the people reading Surah Al-Baqarah, then he approaches for his benefit, and for the sake of the general people or some of them. The interpretation is that the presence of inheritance or inheritance leads to Strife and conflict between female and male heirs, brothers of relatives, and cousins. Interpretation of Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever recites Surat Al-Baqarah or has it read to him in his sleep will have longevity and justice in his life and religion. If one possesses it, he will move in his life to a new stage in which he will have wealth, livelihood and abundance, and for the seeker of knowledge, it is interpreted as gaining higher degrees in his knowledge, which paves the way for and longevity, and for scholars specializing in Sharia, the science of religion and its rulings. Al-Nabulsi narrated Whoever reads it in his sleep or has someone read it to him: he is one of the people of morals and righteousness, he will hasten reward and be good, he hates evil and wickedness, and he is patient with people. Evil mixed with kindness. Good job anyway. Interpretation of reading Surah Al-Baqarah in a dream. Surat Al-Baqarah is one of the longest surahs of the Holy Qur’an. Therefore, the interpretation of a dream of one who reads it or reads something from it has many aspects and several sayings said by scholars, and we summarize them in points. Prosperity, righteousness, peace of mind, and freedom from the temptations of the world. Transferring from one place to another, and this The latter is better than the former. Longevity and abundance in the diet. Desperation for reward and reward and fighting to obtain the highest grades on the Day of Resurrection. Dispute over inheritance by the uncle or cousin. Interpretation of Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream. Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream indicates an increase in life and happiness and also indicates a stable, peaceful life and sustenance. And

Longevity and abundance in the diet. Desperation for reward and reward and fighting to obtain the highest grades on the Day of Resurrection. Dispute over inheritance by the uncle or cousin. Interpretation of Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream. Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream indicates an increase in life and happiness and also indicates a stable, peaceful life and sustenance. And

He believes that it is a good omen for the fortuneteller that he will be in a high position and will gain great authority among her people. If a girl sees in a dream that she is riding in the car in the back seat and A strange man leads her and she is afraid of this person or he is strong in body and threatens her. title: Interpretation of the color of cream in a dream. The meaning of the color of cream in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a single girl in cream for a married woman, for a pregnant woman for a divorced woman, whether she is wearing a long short dress, shoes, shirt skirt, blouse, hijab, beige, gold, light or dark brown and many others by Ibn Sirin Creamy Seeing a cream color in a dream is good news and special blessings for a single woman, so it shows their satisfaction. Providing for them through good marriage for girls indicates an increase in the number of applicants for marriage and earning a living in the end through a good marriage. He is a very kind person who respects everyone, especially the elderly, and appreciates situations, so he knows where and when he can speak. Hence, it will be loved and appreciated by everyone. If you see a cream color in a dream or dream, it symbolizes the basic and necessary things. The cream color can also symbolize your neutral attitude to your real life. Seeing a cream color is a good vision that indicates that you will have a beautiful romantic period. For single people, it indicates that they made the decision to get married during this period. For married people, it indicates that they lived a peaceful life. For the sick, the effects of the disease will end slowly and he will return to his usual daily life easily and thus he will recover after a short period and his health will return again. This vision indicates the emergence of some obstacles in Work, especially in financial income, and therefore he must organize his work. Buying cream clothes generally expresses the visionary’s perception of comfort, contentment, and the flourishing of his feelings and emotions to a great extent. It indicates an improvement in his life’s conditions, the visionary’s reconciliation in a bilateral relationship that existed between them for a while, but it soon passes. This will lead them to spend a happy and fulfilling life. It also indicates a peaceful life filled with happiness, love, and psychological comfort, and seeing things from positive aspects. See the cream wedding dress. The dreamer must be patient and diligent to achieve his will and goals in life. For single people, they should not rush into early marriage decisions. For married people, this indicates that they are facing some problems in their relationship. Psychological interpretation of seeing colored cream It indicates that there is not enough opportunity to make decisions, although the visionary has been seriously thinking about his life for a long time, but until now he will not be able to make decisions Correct. Seeing a cream wedding dress in a dream means that he is able to bring the visionary closer to what his heart desires and marry her, forming a beautiful and happy family, and things and life will go as he wanted and planned in the previous periods. Those moments are missing. Seeing a generous shirt in a dream indicates sustenance and luck as the completion of marriage or engagement and the transition to a happy and joyful life. It also indicates a person who works hard at his work and therefore will be able to reach the stations, and this is because he does not. He repeats his mistakes and benefits and learns from others, and this indicates the life of married people with good offspring and the elderly to provide them with grandchildren. Seeing a generous scarf in a dream Regular prayer and good deeds to get closer to God Almighty and realize His provision, it is a vision that brings

title: Interpretation of a dream about toothache, the meaning of pain in a dream

preview.html: A dream of pain for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man, either a tooth that fell out in the lower part of the forehead, a white upper front in front of me. I dreamed that my teeth hurt, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of toothache in a dream. Whoever sees pain or pain in one of his molars or in one of his teeth, then hears bad words from his relatives. Seeing pain in the neck and pain in a dream means that the dreamer misinterpreted and coordinated intercourse until problems arose. And division. Seeing pain in the neck and pain in a dream indicates that he betrayed the trust entrusted to him and did not fulfill it, and for this reason he was punished and he spent the money in sin, then he feels remorse, and it is said. Seeing stomach pain is the health of relatives and household members, and whoever sees that he is suffering from pain in the navel indicates that he will heal his wife, and seeing heartache in a dream is evidence of infidelity in bed, and seeing a person. Suffering from aches and pains in the liver indicates mistreatment of the child, and seeing the spleen aches and pain indicates the corruption of abundant wealth. Pain in the lung or lungs * indicates the approaching term, and back pain in a dream indicates the death of a brother and indicates walking in disobedience to God Almighty. Interpretation of teeth in a dream of Imam al-Sadiq. Ja`far al-Sadiq said: Interpretation of a dream about teeth has six aspects for the people of the household, and money is beneficial and painful, and separate. And harm from relatives. Whoever dreams that he has a tooth so that he does not grow it, this indicates something is wrong. And whoever dreams that he grows next to someone like him will benefit from what is attributed to him on behalf of those mentioned or from those who replace him. Whoever dreams of having his teeth extracted and then putting them back in their place, then his relatives reject him, then They return to what they were. Abu Saeed the preacher said: If he sees his teeth made of metal or plants, this indicates his death. Whoever sees that his teeth are mixed is not very praiseworthy. Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees his tooth falling to the ground and gets it, this indicates that he will give birth to a son, If he does not take it as an indication of the death of a relative. Jaber Al-Maghribi said: “If he sees a tooth that hurts him and he heals and removes it: it is good and beneficial.” Khaled Al-Isfahani said: “Whoever sees that his mouth has one tooth, this means that he has lived a year, and if he sees more of them, less than ten.” The expression for each of them is Sunnah. “Whoever sees his tooth cut out and he is in pain, it is a calamity or calamity. Whoever dreams that his teeth are hurting, it is the appearance of distress and distress from his relatives. Interpretation of toothache in a dream to extract a tooth in a dream

Whoever sees pain or pain in one of his molars or in one of his teeth, then hears bad words from his relatives, and seeing pain in the neck and pain in a dream means that the dreamer misbehaved and coordinated intercourse until problems appeared. And division. And seeing pain in the neck and pain in a dream indicates that he betrayed the trust entrusted to him and did not fulfill it, and for this he was punished and spent money in disobedience, then he feels remorse, and it is said. That seeing stomach pain is the health of relatives and people of the house, and whoever sees that he is suffering from pain in the navel indicates that his wife will be healed, and seeing heart pain in a dream is evidence of insincerity in bed, and seeing a person. Which is suffering from aches and pains in the liver, this indicates mistreatment of the child and seeing spleen pain and its pain indicates the corruption of abundant money. Pain in the lungs or lungs * indicates the approach of the term, and back pain in a dream indicates the death of a brother indicates walking in disobedience to God Almighty. Interpretation of teeth in a dream of Imam al-Sadiq Jaafar al-Sadiq said: Interpretation of a dream of teeth in six aspects for the people of the house, and money is beneficial and painful, and separate and harmful from relatives. And whoever dreams that he has a tooth so that it does not grow, this indicates a mistake. And whoever dreams that he grows up next to his like benefits from what is attributed to him about the aforementioned or from those who take his place. Whoever dreams of extracting his teeth and then returning them to their place, then his relatives reject him, then they return to what they were. Abu Saeed al-Da’i said: If he sees his teeth from metal or plant, this indicates his death. Whoever sees that his teeth are mixed, it is not very praiseworthy. Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees his tooth falling to the ground and gets it, this indicates that he will give birth to a boy, and if he does not take it, it indicates the death of a relative. Jaber al-Maghribi said: “If he sees a tooth that hurts him and heals and extracts it: it is good and benefit. Khalid al-Isfahani said: “Whoever sees that his mouth has One tooth, means that he lived a year, and if he saw more than ten of them, then his interpretation of each of them is a year. “Whoever sees his tooth cut off and he is in pain, it is a calamity or a misfortune. Whoever dreams that his teeth are hurting him, it is the appearance of distress and distress from his relatives Interpretation of toothache in a dream To extract a molar in a dream

title: What is the interpretation of stairs in a dream for a married woman?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a staircase in a dream for a married woman? There are many dreams in which the owner may think that it is good news when it is not, or that he believes that it is a bad omen but it is not, and among these dreams is the appearance of a staircase in a dream, and dream interpreters have reported about Many. Interpretations of seeing stairs in a dream, especially for a married woman, and any interpretation related to the dreamer’s own condition regarding stairs, and we will tell you about these cases below. If a married woman sees in her dream that there is a ladder next to her, and she is at the bottom of it, but she does not pay attention to it in her dream or does not use it in her dream, then Some dream interpreters see this interpretation as saying that there is a way that will raise the status of her and her family, but it requires some simple effort, and she must reconsider the variables that surround her, because God wants her and her family to find that way. You must struggle until you reach the end of this path, and attain the goodness that this path brings, and in most cases it is advancement in position, and God knows best. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is on the same stairs, and she is still on the first steps of this stairs, and the stairs Climbs to the top, some dream interpreters believe this is evidence that it is. She is at the head of a path that will lead her to great success for herself and her family, but she wants help from the rest of the family members and must pray to God Almighty to help her reach the good that this path hides, which she will reach, God willing, soon. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is on the same path. The stairs, and she is still on the first step of this stairs, but this stairs went down, then some interpreters see in dream A, in this evidence that she is on the threshold of a path that leads her to some losses and in the end she falls. It is a great loss, God forbid, so dream interpreters advise her to wait to make her next decisions so that we do not make a mistake and choose this is the choice, and pray to God and seek His help in His future and present decisions, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is on the stairs, and she is in the middle of it, And she hesitated to go up and down, this means that she lost some decisions, or that she has already made some decisions. She currently consults herself if she can. To complete the path or return to where she was, and here the interpreters of the dream advise her to trust in God and try to pray Istikhara so that God will help her - with His permission - if she completes her path, or He will return to her. Where did it come from, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of the stairs in a dream for a married woman, Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin mentions that in a married woman’s vision of the stairs in her sleep, he has many evidence, including the condition of the stairs, and his statements are attributed to him as follows. If a married woman sees In her dream, there is an upright, strong ladder on the ground. According to some opinions attributed to Ibn Sirin, he says that this is evidence of physical strength and enjoyment of vitality and health. If a married woman sees in her dream a steep and unstable ladder

title: Interpretation of seeing my mother giving birth in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing my mother giving birth in a dream can be a sign of sustenance and blessings, and seeing a mother giving birth in a dream can indicate the emergence of problems and difficulties. This dream has also been interpreted through many praiseworthy and unpleasant interpretations according to a number of major interpreters, the most famous of which are Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Imam al-Sadiq. Let us share with you the most important interpretations related to seeing my mother giving birth in a dream to unmarried and married women, men, and pregnant women. Seeing my mother Giving birth in a dreamIf a girl sees in a dream that her mother is giving birth, then this vision indicates a lot of nourishment that she will receive in the next period of her life. A man dreams that his mother is giving birth in a dream, this dream shows the mood of all the problems and crises that he is going through in his life. A mother giving birth in a dream is evidence of recovery from diseases and the safety of the body. If the dreamer’s mother is suffering from pain or illness, this vision indicates that the mother will soon recover from the health problem she is suffering from. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his mother is feeling pain from childbirth, This dream is an indication that this woman will suffer from many problems and pains in her life. Seeing my mother giving birth to Ibn Sirin in the dreams of Ibn Sirin indicates that the mother giving birth in a dream is evidence of the emergence of obstacles and difficulties for the dreamer, because the baby is in the hands of another person. But if you are the mother who gives birth to a man In a dream, this is an indication that his wife’s birth will be difficult. While seeing a mother giving birth without a pregnancy in a dream indicates that the dreamer will gain great benefit and strength. Seeing a mother giving birth to an unmarried woman in a dream shows sadness and problems in her life, and for a married woman this It indicates the difficulties of life. It is said that dreaming of a mother giving birth to a worker in a dream indicates a delay in work and perhaps its loss. Seeing the birth of a mother and the death of a child in a dream is evidence of separation from parents and friends. Perhaps the premature birth of a mother in a dream indicates the dreamer’s urgent need to demand his rights. Vision My mother giving birth on the street in a dream indicates the difficulty of the dreamer’s situation. As for my mother giving birth in a dream in a dream, this indicates that there are disagreements, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Seeing my mother giving birth to Ibn Shaheen in dreams. Seeing Ibn Shaheen in a dream that the mother gives birth to a girl, this is evidence of Great good. Perhaps a mother’s dream of giving birth to a boy in a dream indicates a lot of fears or an unpleasant conversation that will hurt her. While seeing a mother giving birth to a boy in a dream while she is pregnant in reality, this indicates that she has given birth to a girl and vice versa. Seeing my mother giving birth to Imam Al-Sadiq in a dream if A man sees that his mother is giving birth to a new baby and is already waiting for something to happen, this may indicate that he has achieved what he wants and is fulfilling his aspirations and desires. But if one sees that the mother is giving birth and there are some people around her, this is good news for the dreamer to enter into a new business venture. While An unmarried girl sees that her mother is giving birth, this indicates that this will alleviate her worries and problems that caused her sadness. If the girl sees that his mother
